channel.title: Ios on Adam Coding Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Adam Coding Corner

item.title: Would you go for mobile development again, after 10 years of doing it?
item.description: I went to a meetup in my city last week and a guy I just met there popped a question after a while of conversation: with my experience, would I go for mobile software development again or pick a different area?
